item.title: raspberry pi security camera monitor
item.description: I took some time off between jobs. Among the things I did with my down time, I set up a secondary monitor for an IP camera system. Here is how it works. My dad had a couple of security cameras installed. They all feed in to a DVR that sits next to his computer. Besides recording, the thing muxes the camera feeds into a single picture-in-picture stream which is known in security-camera-speak as “channel zero”.
